title: Murtlap Essence
content: Murtlap Essence was a solution of strained and pickled tentacles of Murtlaps. It soothed painful cuts and abrasions, and helped them to heal.[1]

infobox.EffectCharacteristicsKnown ingredients: Soothes and heals cuts and abrasions[1]Blue in colour[2]Murtlap tentacles[1]
